code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Board=_ref=>{let{board,selectedPositions,isPlacingTiles,onCellClick,onColumnClick}=_ref;const isSelected=(x,y)=>{return selectedPositions.some(p=>p.x===x&&p.y===y);};const isDropZone=(x,y)=>{return isPlacingTiles&&y===0;};const getPlayerColor=playerId=>{if(playerId===undefined)return'#999';const colors=['#FF6B6B','#4ECDC4','#45B7D1','#FFA07A'];return colors[playerId]||'#999';};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"board-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"board",children:board.map((row,y)=>row.map((cell,x)=>{const tile=cell;const selected=isSelected(x,y);const dropZone=isDropZone(x,y);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"cell ".concat(selected?'highlighted':''," ").concat(dropZone?'drop-zone':''),onClick:()=>{if(dropZone){onColumnClick(x);}else{onCellClick(x,y);}},children:tile&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"tile",style:{borderLeft:"4px solid ".concat(getPlayerColor(tile.playerId))},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"letter",children:tile.letter}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"points",children:tile.points})]})},"".concat(x,"-").concat(y));}))})});};export default Board;
